> [[ 91 ]]

A quick swipe at the leg, before you move out of reach of another swing. Your attack from before did a number on it, lessening the range of that punching attack it likes so much. Another swipe, and flames lash at the gash you leave in its crystalline body, tourmaline gems melting to black tar where your sword strikes. You think you'll do it another favor.

You jump upwards, narrowly avoiding the beam, and—luckily finding a crystalline foothold—use leverage and enhanced speed to plant your longsword straight through the construct's head. Light seeps from the exit wound, and cracks spiderweb across the surface; you tumble to the ground in time to see the explosion, the red lights around you fading.

“He's disabled it!” You hear Kainzo shout, and get back on your feet as he charges past you, moving into range with a mighty leaping swing. “Finish this, now!”

A barrage of caster bolts, increasing in frequency as Vyx closes the distance, bombards the Construct in the chest, accompanied by small explosions that aggregate into a great, obscuring cloud of smoke. Andor and Donnel strike again, ducking backwards as Dorian looses his spell—a luminescent guillotine of wind that crosses the arena floor, bisecting whatever remains of the Guardian Construct with a great display of iridescent lights and a shower of brilliant crystal fragments.

> [[ Guardian Construct was defeated. ]]
